title: Exercise interventions for treatment of depression in adults

pico.population: Adults aged 18+ with diagnosis of depression (DSM/ICD criteria)
pico.comparator: Treatment as usual, waitlist control, or antidepressant medication

inclusion_criteria: Structured exercise intervention of at least 4 weeks duration
Depression outcome measured with validated instrument
exclusion_criteria: Exercise as adjunct to other intervention without control group
search_strategy: depression[MeSH] AND exercise[MeSH] AND (randomized controlled trial[pt] OR RCT[tiab])
